name: Memory (MemoryDB)
description: Self-hosted AI agent memory via MemoryDB REST API with auto-recall and auto-capture

baseUrl.label: MemoryDB API URL
baseUrl.help: Base URL of the running MemoryDB instance

container.label: Default Container
container.help: Container/namespace for storing memories (isolates per-agent or per-user)

autoCapture.label: Auto-Capture
autoCapture.help: Automatically capture important information from conversations

autoRecall.label: Auto-Recall
autoRecall.help: Automatically inject relevant memories into context before each agent turn

autoRecallLimit.label: Auto-Recall Limit
autoRecallLimit.help: Max memories to inject per turn (default: 5)

apiKey.label: API Key (optional)
apiKey.help: Bearer token for MemoryDB API authentication (if configured)

conversationLog.label: Conversation Logging
conversationLog.help: Log all inbound/outbound messages to MemoryDB for full conversation history

sessionProfile.label: Session Profile Preload
sessionProfile.help: Preload container profile (key facts, recent context) at session start

inherit.label: Inherit Parent Containers
inherit.help: Include results from parent containers when searching (e.g. system-level knowledge)
